Test Name: NGS-based genetic testing for Miscellaneous Blueprint Genetics panels
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from patient specimens
Purpose: To analyze genomic DNA and generate genetic test results using NGS for identifying variants associated with inherited disorders.
Container: Sterile tube suitable for DNA specimens
Equipment: NGS platform, PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction kit, electrophoresis system, Qubit/Nanodrop quantification instruments, and Blueprint Genetics bioinformatics software
